title: Modern Eco-Conscious Duplex with Spacious Garden in Lively Ligota
description: Discover this expansive, eco-designed duplex featuring five generous bedrooms and three modern bathrooms, set across 198 square meters. Inside, natural finishes blend with contemporary functionalities such as a security system, built-in wardrobes, and energy-efficient lighting. An open-plan living area extends to an inviting terrace and private garden—ideal for entertaining or unwinding amid lush landscaping. Thoughtful storage solutions, including a dedicated storage locker, ground this beautifully presented family home in both comfort and order.
neighborhood_description: Located in Katowice's sought-after Ligota, a vibrant, community-focused area known for its mix of family-friendly convenience, local cafes, and innovative tech scenes. Lush parks, top schools, and local markets are just a stroll away, supporting a dynamic lifestyle for families and professional long-term renters alike. Strong public transport links and quick highway access ensure effortless connectivity throughout the region while retaining an appealing neighborhood feel.
lifestyle_benefits: proximity to schools and tech amenities
target_buyer: Ideal for long-term renters, particularly families and professionals seeking a sustainable, secure environment with modern amenities, abundant green space, and a supportive local community.
market_positioning: This property distinguishes itself as a rare eco-conscious duplex option in Ligota—a family-friendly, well-connected neighborhood. Its spaciousness, modern essentials, and secure surroundings offer premium comfort in a desirably stable rental segment for Katowice.
